name: TDSG (beta)
description:
This is TDSG,  a revamp of my game from last year, ANSG.

TDSG stands for Top Down Shooter Game. and it is exactly that. You can Shoot, dash and Explode enemies at will, the only rule being that you must not die.

Yea lets be honest here, no one is gonna read this lol, how was your day?
